proposal: Hey there, Connect Wallets community! Congrats on reaching 1130 holders on the BSC network - quite the digital family you've got there. Ever thought about giving them more ways to interact with your token? With our DEX and Lottery tools, anyone in your community can deploy and share in the revenue. Just imagine, your own Uniswap V2 based DEX or a blockchain-based lottery, all with your token ticker. See my profile for demo and details.
